DOC.brief_title: A Comparison External Mechanical Work Between Different Prosthetic Feet
DOC.detailed_description: The study examine application outcome measure determine change function unilateral transtibial amputee ( TTAs ) cause specialized functional prosthetic training ( train ) use four different prosthetic foot . Two self-report measure i.e . Prosthetic Evaluation Questionnaire ( PEQ-13 ) Locomotor Capability Index ( LCI-5 ) , three performance-based measure i.e . Amputee Mobility Predictor ( AMPPRO ) , Six-minute Walk Test ( 6MWT ) , Step Activity Monitor ( SAM ) utilize . Healthy unilateral Transtibial Amputees age 40-65 participate study . Subjects test baseline , receive train exist prosthesis , study socket four prosthetic foot i.e . SACH , SAFE , Talux PROPRIO FOOT 8-10 week period . Training administer testing session .
